events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan request to cover upcoming medical expenses and consolidate existing debt.
Loan team categorised the submitted application under personal loans due to the nature of medical and debt-related expenses.
A loan officer was assigned to help the applicant through the personal loan process and answer any questions.
Initial review performed on applicant details and loan purpose; documents required to confirm medical bills and debt statements.
Requested supporting documents including recent medical bills, debt statements, and proof of income for loan verification.
Applicant submitted all requested documents including medical invoices and detailed statements of outstanding debts.
Credit check completed showing a stable credit history with a few debts being managed consistently.
Risk assessment conducted based on credit score, income verification, and loan purpose to evaluate repayment capacity.
A tailored personal loan offer was presented to the applicant with favorable interest rates and repayment terms.
Applicant responded positively, requesting minor adjustments in repayment schedule to better suit their financial situation.
Application escalated to senior loan officer to review requested repayment adjustments and final loan terms.
Loan approval granted after thorough review of all documents and adjustments requested by applicant accepted.
Loan amount disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account to cover medical bills, debt consolidation, and related expenses.
Follow-up conducted to ensure applicant is satisfied with the loan terms and managing repayments effectively.
Final closure of application after successful funding and positive feedback from applicant regarding loan experience.
